name: SpaceFlightSurvival
description:
Fly through space as you survive an onslaught of enemy attacks

controls:

shift: slows you down to focus on avoidance

space: shoots laser when you have collected a charge

wasd: moves

objective:

-survive as long as you can while racking up points and avoiding attacks

if interested in full project i have uploaded a better polished soon to be full release of the game on another post so to not get the gamejam project mixed with the full release

-cheers
